Package edu.scu.oop.assign2

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TempRegulator
    Interface that represents Temperature Regulator
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alpha1Oven
    Represents a Basic Oven
    Alpha2Oven
    This class represents a smart oven that extends Alpha1Oven functionality and provides options to set cooking mode and temperature(in C)
    OvenThermostat
    Represents the thermostat in an Oven Implements TempRegulator interface
    SmartOvenApplication  
  • Enum Summary

    Enum to represent the cooking mode
    Status
    Enum to represent the oven status
